mapper.select: SELECT id, dept_id AS deptId, rank_id AS rankId, team_id AS teamId, account, name, birth, gender, phone, email, des, joined_at, approved_at, access, del_fl, password FROM emp WHERE account = #{account}

SELECT account, e.name as name, r.name as rankName, d.name as deptName, t.name as teamName, birth, gender, email, access, joined_at, approved_at, del_fl WH FROM emp e JOIN `dept` d on d.id = e.dept_id JOIN `rank` r on r.id = e.rank_id JOIN `team` t on t.id = e.team_id WHERE del_fl = false

SELECT account, e.name as name, r.id as rankId, d.id as deptId, t.id as teamId, birth, gender, email, access, approved_at FROM emp e JOIN `dept` d on d.id = e.dept_id JOIN `rank` r on r.id = e.rank_id JOIN `team` t on t.id = e.team_id WHERE access = 1 AND account = #{account}
